FrontEnd

Class StudentControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.StudentControl

  • public class StudentControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the data fields and methods to control how the student GUI interacts with the student model
    Since:
    April 13, 2018
    Version:
    1.0

      An action listener for the return home button in the student GUI.

      An list selection listener for the assignment list in the student GUI.

      A list selection listener for the course list in the student GUI.

      An action listener for the send email button in the student GUI.

      An action listener for the upload assignment button in the student GUI.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentControl

        public StudentControl(StudentModel model,
                      StudentView view)
        A constructor which sets the model and GUI to the incoming model and view. Also adds listeners to the buttons in the GUI and sets the GUI visible
        Parameters:
        model - - the model to use
        view - - the view to use
